author: Orion Rummler
title: CNN: Fauci says U.S. should issue nationwide stay-at-home order
description: The Trump administration should implement a stay-at-home order for the country, Anthony Fauci, director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, said at a CNN town hall on Thursday. Why it matters: The recommendation stands in contrast to…
content:
Director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases Anthony Fauci recommended on Thursday that all states across the U.S. implement stay-at-home orders, at a CNN town hall.
Why it matters: The recommendation stands in contrast to President … [+1126 chars]
